params.amount_: Amount of sRIP debt issued from donor to recipient
params.recipient_: Address to direct staking yield and vault shares to

redeem().details: Note that a recipient redeeming their vault shares effectively pays back all sRIP debt to donors at the time of redeem. Any future incurred debt will be accounted for with a subsequent redeem or a withdrawal by the specific donor.

deposit(uint256,address).notice: Deposit sRIP, records sender address and assign rebases to recipient

depositsTo(address,address).notice: Get deposited sRIP amount for specific recipient

donatedTo(address,address).notice: Return total amount of sRIP donated to recipient since last full withdrawal

getAllDeposits(address).notice: Return arrays of donor's recipients and deposit amounts, matched by index

redeem().notice: Redeem recipient's full donated amount of sRIP at current index

redeemableBalance(address).notice: Get redeemable sRIP balance of a recipient address

totalDeposits(address).notice: Return total amount of donor's sRIP deposited

totalDonated(address).notice: Return total amount of sRIP donated from donor since last full withdrawal

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Withdraw donor's sRIP from vault and subtracts debt from recipient

userdoc.notice: This contract allows donors to deposit their sRIP and donate their rebases to any address. Donors will be able to withdraw their principal sRIP at any time. Donation recipients can also redeem accrued rebases at any time.
